investorNINO.description: The investor’s National Insurance number. Must conform to the regular expression: ^[A-Z]{2}\d{6}[A-D]$ For example: AB123456D

firstName.description: The investor’s first name. Must conform to the regular expression: ^.{1,50}$ For example: AdiFirstNameMe

lastName.description: The investor’s last name. Must conform to the regular expression: ^.{1,50}$ For example: myLastName

DoB.description:
The investor’s date of birth.
 Must conform to the format : YYYY-MM-DD 
 For example: 2017-05-22
